viewData.name: HP 15.6" EliteBook 755 G5 Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy HP 15.6" EliteBook 755 G5 Laptop featuring 2.2 GHz AMD Ryzen 7 2700U Quad-Core, 16GB DDR4 | 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Display. Review HP G5
viewData.long_description: This 15.6" EliteBook 755 G5 Laptop from HP is designed for on-the-go professionals who need a secure and reliable system. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 2.2 GHz AMD Ryzen 7 2700U quad-core processor, 16GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD. If you need more space, you can connect additional storage solutions using its multiple USB ports. Its 15.6" display, driven by integrated AMD Radeon Vega graphics, features a 1920 x 1080 resolution for crisp and clear content reproduction. Other integrated features include an HDMI port, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, a webcam, microphones, speakers, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
